name: ArtLab
description:
Artlab is a game in which you will find and appreciate the art within you, travelling through 3 scenarios with infinite aspects, expressions and feelings of art.

You will find yourself in a labyrinth in which the only way out is through your intuition, with your decisions you will be able to appreciate art in different ways, but be careful, the route you choose will not always be the right one... Find your way and enjoy the art that lives in you.
